snippet: Teresa and Giuseppe Giudice, known as Joe, were sentenced to prison on Thursday in Federal District Court in New Jersey on conspiracy and bankruptcy fraud charges.
abstract: Teresa and Giuseppe 'Joe' Giudice, stars of reality show Real Housewives of New Jersey, are sentenced to prison on conspiracy and bankruptcy fraud charges; Teresa is given a 15 month sentence and Joe is given 41 months, and couple must pay $414,000 in restitution.
lead_paragraph: Teresa and Giuseppe Giudice, known as Joe, were sentenced to prison on Thursday in Federal District Court in New Jersey on conspiracy and bankruptcy fraud charges.

headline.main: Teresa Giudice and Husband, of ‘Real Housewives,’ Are Sentenced to Prison
headline.print_headline: 2 Stars of ‘Real Housewives’ Are Sentenced to Prison
